name: Forum3
intro: Digital collectible solutions for consumers and brands
introduce: ‍Forum3 is an experiential loyalty company focused on building digital collectible solutions for consumers and brands. The company was created with the belief that Web3 provides the foundation for next-generation consumer engagement and loyalty and that everyone should have the opportunity to be a consumer, participant, member, and owner. The company collaborates with a variety of companies such as Starbucks and The Boston Globe to bring authenticity, inspiration, and fun to consumers and brands.
